.. tags:: destructive-, python, inclusion, class

DestructiveDilemmaInclusion (python class)
=========================================================================

.. seealso::
   :ref:`math concept<destructive__math_inference_rule>` | :ref:`python declaration class<destructive__declaration_python_class>` | :ref:`python sample<destructive__python_sample>`

This section presents the :python:`DestructiveDilemmaInclusion` python class.

This class models the :ref:`inclusion<object_inclusion_math_concept>` of the :ref:`destructive-<destructive__math_inference_rule>` :ref:`inference-rule<inference_rule_math_concept>` in the target :ref:`theory-elaboration-sequence<theory_elaboration_sequence_math_concept>`.

*Punctilious* users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the :python:`TheoryElaborationSequence` class exposes the :python:`destructive_` property, and instanciation is automatic when this property is accessed for the first time.

.. module:: punctilious
   :noindex:
.. autoclass:: DestructiveDilemmaInclusion
   :members:
